name: Colibris Design and Communications
overview:
Colibris is a cutting edge design firm that specializes in custom web design and communications solutions.

When Colibris says custom, they mean it. “Template” is a dirty word in their office. they take the time to learn about the company and its owner(s) and use that information to create a web design that truly represents the company and its vision. Colibris offers a wide range of web services that include design, social media marketing, search engine optimization and web branding.

Colibris offers custom-built solutions for companies that are looking to streamline their communications. Can you imagine a paperless office, where all your data is stored in a secure, accessible and organized location? Then you need to call Colibris for a free consultation today.

Colibris wants to always exceed the client’s expectations both in design and customer service.
